content.text:
[@buoyantair](@b3ae566cmHDS8GYSHoKP8vsjRExQp5glpGRF1+dg0Sw=.ed25519) 

I don't have any constructive input, but I'm rooting for you! Hope everything goes well, I'm happy to hear that talking to your aunt ended up being a positive experience. :heart: Please keep us updated if you have the time/energy! Reading your message about your aunt made my morning.
